name: admin.teams.settings.setDefaultChannels
desc: Set the default channels of a workspace.

team_id.desc: ID for the workspace to set the default channel for.

errors.failed_to_set_default_channels: We encountered an error while trying to set the default channel.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_auth: The given token is not authorized for the requested `team_id`.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
errors.one_or_more_invalid_channels: One or more of the passed channel IDs was invalid.
errors.restricted_action: The actor does not have admin permissions for the team in context
